title: The most attentive guest team making sure you had the best stay

main.name: Daryl A
main.description:
The property is one of the premier resort in Boracay. The rooms are well appointed and buffet breakfast offers the best and well thought of selection.

The most distinct feature is the attentiveness of the team. They are well-trained and makes sure you had the best experience from arriving to the property all the way to departure from Boracay.

main.name: sheryll ann v
main.description: The best stay ever. Very heartwarming. They gave a cake for my daughter’s 21st and a banner. We cannot find a much better hotel where the people are very accomodating and warm. We love Discovery Suites. Amenities, location, Service. Excellent years of relationship with this hotel. Will always go back:)

attributes.value: The best stay ever. Very heartwarming. They gave a cake for my daughter’s 21st and a banner. We cannot find a much better hotel where the people are very accomodating and warm. We love Discovery Suites. Amenities, location, Service. Excellent years of relationship with this hotel. Will always go back:)

main.name: madel a
main.description:
The place is clean and everything is neat. Perfect place to use for events and it is quite spacious that can accommodate up to 70 guests. Great view since it is a high floor.

The guests were also thrilled because how great the place is, and the exclusivity of the area is also perfect for a private event.

main.name: Brianna C
main.description:
we had a great time at discover suites magellan function room in the 41st floor

we celebrated my grandmother's 80th birthday and everyone had so much fun. they had excellent service. the head waiter sir jonathan was organized and kind. our event was last minute but they managed to get and prepare what we wanted.

main.name: Marylene P
main.description: We reserved an events place for our strategy deployment activity today. All our food are fresh and delicious. Team is attentive to all our needs and requests during the activity. Edlyn gave an exceptional service all throughout. Thank you Discovery Suites for the wonderful experience.

main.name: Camper02601975839
main.description:
The service is 10 out of 10, Ms. Janeya and the rest of the staff is accommodating and hospitable, Restaurant 5 and Discovery Suits must be top of mind when it comes to accommodation and food. Kudos!!!!

The service is 10 out of 10

The service is 10 out of 10

main.name: Jacqueline K
main.description: I’ve been with discovery primea twice, celebrating significant moments of my life. Customer service is superb, food is great, a lot of complimentary services and food. The view is great in the room and also in the pool. Will definitely go back

attributes.value: I’ve been with discovery primea twice, celebrating significant moments of my life. Customer service is superb, food is great, a lot of complimentary services and food. The view is great in the room and also in the pool. Will definitely go back

title: Best hotel in the heart of Makati

main.name: Aly G
main.description: Very accommodating staff. Everyone happily served out requests and needs! Flame rooftop bar is also worth the try!! Very diverse cocktail menu aside from the classic cocktails. Good selection of food with the different restaurants within the hotel. Is also a very convenient walk away from Glorietta mall and the rest of Makati. Definitely a great experience and worth the stay!

attributes.value: Very accommodating staff. Everyone happily served out requests and needs! Flame rooftop bar is also worth the try!! Very diverse cocktail menu aside from the classic cocktails. Good selection of food with the different restaurants within the hotel. Is also a very convenient walk away from Glorietta mall and the rest of Makati. Definitely a great experience and worth the stay!

main.name: FarAway52722700724
main.description: We stayed here with our family for 4 days, The hotel is really good, spacious rooms and the location is fantastic with malls nearby, Room service was great too, the only con was the breakfast spread as the variety wasn’t much but it is still manageable, def recommend staying here if you’re visiting manila :)

attributes.value: We stayed here with our family for 4 days, The hotel is really good, spacious rooms and the location is fantastic with malls nearby, Room service was great too, the only con was the breakfast spread as the variety wasn’t much but it is still manageable, def recommend staying here if you’re visiting manila :)

main.name: Dreamer23
main.description: Fantastic hotel. Was recommended by a friend. Absolutely loved it. Staff are amazing and so helpful. We travel often and will be definitely coming back here. Is close to everything. We had a 2 bedroom primea suite and was super. Great hotel and great service.

attributes.value: Fantastic hotel. Was recommended by a friend. Absolutely loved it. Staff are amazing and so helpful. We travel often and will be definitely coming back here. Is close to everything. We had a 2 bedroom primea suite and was super. Great hotel and great service.

main.name: Jerric G
main.description: We booked because it is near the mall. Kids had lots of fun. Check-in & check-out was smooth, no waiting time. Love the food in buffet at Tapenade. Accommodation is good and clean, staffs are polite and approachable. The entire experience was wonderful. Good location and good price. I will stay there again.

attributes.value: We booked because it is near the mall. Kids had lots of fun. Check-in & check-out was smooth, no waiting time. Love the food in buffet at Tapenade. Accommodation is good and clean, staffs are polite and approachable. The entire experience was wonderful. Good location and good price. I will stay there again.

main.name: Hans
main.description: An extraordinary massage experience! The therapist’s skill and intuitive touch melted away all my stress. The serene atmosphere, high-quality oils, and personalized care left me feeling rejuvenated in body, mind, and spirit. Truly the best massage I’ve ever had. Highly recommended!

attributes.value: An extraordinary massage experience! The therapist’s skill and intuitive touch melted away all my stress. The serene atmosphere, high-quality oils, and personalized care left me feeling rejuvenated in body, mind, and spirit. Truly the best massage I’ve ever had. Highly recommended!

title: Best place to stay in Boracay

main.name: Dong M
main.description: We had an excellent stay at Discovery Shores Boracay, where the staff's warm and accommodating service made our experience truly memorable. From the moment we arrived, we felt welcomed and well cared for, with every detail thoughtfully attended to.

attributes.value: We had an excellent stay at Discovery Shores Boracay, where the staff's warm and accommodating service made our experience truly memorable. From the moment we arrived, we felt welcomed and well cared for, with every detail thoughtfully attended to.

title: Discover Hospitality At Its Finest With Discovery Shores

main.name: Christina Mila J
main.description:
Absolutely the BEST on the island! No other service can compare to Discovery's exceptional hospitality, care, and attention to its guests. From the moment you arrive at the resort, you are greeted with the warmest smiles, setting the tone for an unforgettable vacation.

 

The facilities are top-notch and incredibly comfortable, leaving you wanting for nothing. The food is excellent, satisfying even the most discerning palates. Our kids loved the pool, jacuzzi, and beachfront, which are complete with kids' sand toys. They even offer afternoon activities for the little ones, allowing parents to relax fully.

 

Discovery's attention to detail is beyond anything we've ever experienced. Situated in station 1, it places you in the best part of Boracay. It truly feels like our home away from home, and is definitely one of our go-to places for family celebrations/ milestones or even a simple getaway to take a break from the city. WE JUST COULDN'T GET ENOUGH.

 

Highly recommended for anyone looking for a perfect getaway!

attributes.value:

main.name: Dodge R
main.description:
The service is top notch. We were last here for our honeymoon 10 years ago, and this time around we came with our kids in tow. The staff always helped us keep an eye on the kids and made sure they were comfortable and safe.

At least once a week until now, the kids remind us that they want to go back.

attributes.value:
The service is top notch. We were last here for our honeymoon 10 years ago, and this time around we came with our kids in tow. The staff always helped us keep an eye on the kids and made sure they were comfortable and safe.

At least once a week until now, the kids remind us that they want to go back.

title: Very accommodating, beautiful scenery, comfortable stay, luxurious, amazing food

main.name: Christopher W
main.description: It is my first time in boracay however this has been the most accommodating and enjoyable hotel stay I have ever experienced. I am traveling with family who claim this is their favorite place to stay and I can say with 100% that this place has surpassed my every expectation. The service is attentive and respectful, they are helpful, and the breakfast has a very large selection and the tocino and garlic rice was truly amazing. The Wifi here is strong and The rooms are also very modern and clean and they offer many complimentary desserts aswell as room services. The island of Boracay is beautiful and I will definitely be back and I can’t imagine staying at any other resort! Thank you Discovery Shores for the stay and I hope to be back soon!

attributes.value: It is my first time in boracay however this has been the most accommodating and enjoyable hotel stay I have ever experienced. I am traveling with family who claim this is their favorite place to stay and I can say with 100% that this place has surpassed my every expectation. The service is attentive and respectful, they are helpful, and the breakfast has a very large selection and the tocino and garlic rice was truly amazing. The island of Boracay is beautiful and I will definitely be back and I can’t imagine staying at any other resort! Thank you Discovery Shores for the stay and I hope to be back soon!

title: Relax action at its best in a peaceful island

main.name: Liza P
main.description:
The perfect place for a Peace & Quiet vacation. Hermie is the best, she took care of all our needs and requests and made sure that nothing is overlooked. She even join and sang a song during our karaoke time.
All the staff are wonderful, from airport pick up/ drop off by Mang Carding, Kevin
Mawie, Fel and the lady who gave us a foot wash.
Glow Spa was one of the highlights, my husband and I had the most relaxing massage by Michelle, my husband forgot his masseuse name.
Everyone was so accommodating, shout out to Captain Raymond and the guy from the dive shop who volunteered to guide us on our snorkeling activity.

attributes.value:
The perfect place for a Peace & Quiet vacation. Hermie is the best, she took care of all our needs and requests and made sure that nothing is overlooked. She even join and sang a song during our karaoke time.

main.name: HMG
main.description: We just visited this beautiful gem. And all i can say is, applause applause applause. After visiting a busy place like boracay last year, we decided to go relax this time. And it is the best decision, to go to Club Paradise. A piece of heaven on earth. We stayed for 7 days, but still not enough üò≠ still we wanted to stay more if only we could. Yes it is bit pricey, but all worth it üëå. Special mentioned to all the staff, from picking up in airport, to the front desk, and to all staff even those picking up leaves every morning, you are the reason why, people are coming back. Very welcoming, accomodating, very respectful, very caring and friendly. Not to mentioned the place of course, it is superb. We have everyday treats, in the room and around the pool. Even surprised us with a special dinner set up on our last dinner in the island. Making me feel so proud of our beautiful place and people. I hope 1 day, i can come back again.

Even surprised us with a special dinner set up on our last dinner in the island. Making me feel so proud of our beautiful place and people. I hope 1 day, i can come back again.

main.name: Diane O
main.description:
Club Paradise Palawan / Discovery Coron experience is wonderful!

My husband and I came for a quick trip to relax and unwind and as expected from the Discovery group service, hospitality was at its best. We had an early flight and they offered a room for us to stay (without us prompting) until our assigned room is ready. Nikko, the guest relations officer took care of our itinerary and always checked in on us during our entire stay.

The pool is heated, the beach has crystal clear waters, and the view is amazing.

We will definitely be back with the kids during school break!

We will definitely be back with the kids during school break!

title: Tropical Paradise with Exceptional Food, Service, and Wildlife

main.name: Jos√© Alejandro Rey Azc√°rate
main.description:
We stayed at Club Palawan in June and had an amazing experience. The food and service were excellent, making each meal a delight. We also enjoyed fantastic excursions and diving, thanks to Mark and Ante, who made sure we had the best experiences possible.

The hotel is located on an island just 20 minutes from the shore, offering a perfect escape. We stayed in a villa right in front of the beach, which was absolutely stunning. One of the coolest aspects was the fruit bats that were everywhere, adding a unique touch to the beautiful surroundings.

The grounds of the resort are breathtaking, with lush landscapes that make it a true tropical paradise. I highly recommend Club Palawan for anyone looking to enjoy the best of island living.

attributes.value:

The hotel is located on an island just 20 minutes from the shore, offering a perfect escape. We stayed in a villa right in front of the beach, which was absolutely stunning. One of the coolest aspects was the fruit bats that were everywhere, adding a unique touch to the beautiful surroundings.

The grounds of the resort are breathtaking, with lush landscapes that make it a true tropical paradise. I highly recommend Club Palawan for anyone looking to enjoy the best of island living.

main.name: Jarrad105
main.description: Love Club Paradise (Discovery Coron). Staff are always friendly and helpful. Even in a typhoon they are still so accommodating. Best snorkeling in Palawan/Coron. No need to go anywhere else. Meals are always amazing. Ill miss Sunny the monitor lizard who shared breakfasts with me and George the night heron who shared dinners with me. Apologies to the staff who said not to feed the animals :) Cant wait to come back again and again.

attributes.value: Love Club Paradise (Discovery Coron). Staff are always friendly and helpful. Even in a typhoon they are still so accommodating. Best snorkeling in Palawan/Coron. No need to go anywhere else. Meals are always amazing. Ill miss Sunny the monitor lizard who shared breakfasts with me and George the night heron who shared dinners with me. Apologies to the staff who said not to feed the animals :) Cant wait to come back again and again.

main.name: Meander00851062050
main.description: Excellent service, very comfortable hotel to stay, amenities are great, big rooms, you can wash your clothes with no extra charge, we enjoy the gym and pool, very close to Podium mall just across the street, and most of all, very polite, professional, hard working, courteous staff, special mention the front desk crew, Mikee, Krishna and Edmund, you guys are all amazing! We will come back here again for sure.

attributes.value: Excellent service, very comfortable hotel to stay, amenities are great, big rooms, you can wash your clothes with no extra charge, we enjoy the gym and pool, very close to Podium mall just across the street, and most of all, very polite, professional, hard working, courteous staff, special mention the front desk crew, Mikee, Krishna and Edmund, you guys are all amazing! We will come back here again for sure.

main.name: Roam33723032148
main.description: Real definition of eat, sleep, and repeat! Perfect place to go to de-stress! Lots of food choices to try. People (managers, staffs) are very helpful and accommodating too. Special thank you to ma’am Lorie of Haribar for welcoming us and being so accommodating!

title: Perfect place to chill by the beach and explore coron

main.name: Christy
main.description: Great service and staff are all accommodating and friendly. The room is clean and the whole island is beautiful, nice fine sand. I booked for sunset view and it is one of the best just a few step to the beach itself. There are always a lot of activities you can do as well in the beach like kayaking, snorkeling, and tours around Coron to explore.

attributes.value: Great service and staff are all accommodating and friendly. The room is clean and the whole island is beautiful, nice fine sand. I booked for sunset view and it is one of the best just a few step to the beach itself. There are always a lot of activities you can do as well in the beach like kayaking, snorkeling, and tours around Coron to explore.

main.name: aserguzeus
main.description: I stayed in Discovery Primea to celebrate my birthday with family. It's a memorable experience from check in to checking out, very accommodating staff, super friendly, very professional with a great smile. Everything is perfect! What that I LOVE most is a hotel room that is super clean with a great ambiance, very organized. Infinity pool has a very nice view, buffet breakfast at Restaurant Tapenade is very yummy with more selections of food. Hotel lobby has a great atmosphere.

attributes.value: I stayed in Discovery Primea to celebrate my birthday with family. It's a memorable experience from check in to checking out, very accommodating staff, super friendly, very professional with a great smile. Everything is perfect! What that I LOVE most is a hotel room that is super clean with a great ambiance, very organized. Infinity pool has a very nice view, buffet breakfast at Restaurant Tapenade is very yummy with more selections of food. Hotel lobby has a great atmosphere.

main.name: Reina A
main.description: We stayed here on March 16 to celebrate my parents' birthdays, and I can only say great things about the hotel, the staff, and Krystal, who ensured we had an amazing, homey experience. It’s becoming a family tradition to celebrate here, and we're excited to come back on June 8 for my brother's birthday.
